nodes.text: The Garia system was a star system that was located within the Brak sector, in the Expansion Region of the galaxy. The system contained the planet Garia, which was capable of foodstuff production as well as a degree of manufacturing capabilities.

During the Clone Wars, Garia was the site of a battle between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The Republic staged an invasion of the planet, which was held by the Separatists.

During the Galactic Civil War, the Galactic Empire established an Imperial Navy staging area in the system. Permits were required for entry into the system, with strict penalties enacted against any violators. Security in the system was augmented by constant picket ship patrols and sensor stations that monitored the outer edges of the system.

Unlike their efforts in the Bacrana, Rehn, and Skone systems, the Alliance to Restore the Republic's Brak Sector Force was unable to establish a listening post in the system due to a lack of suitable sites. Instead, the Alliance used regular probe droid and scout vessel sweeps to obtain information on Imperial fleet movements in the system.
